result.execSummary:
The defendant Andrew D. Schroeder was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case.

  • Theft-False Representation >$2500-$5000, a class I felony, Wisconsin Statutes 943.20(1)(d).

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

Court will order that restitution will be paid first before any costs.

Defendant Andrew David Schroeder in court with attorney Jessica L Schuster.  Defendant Andrew David Schroeder in custody.  Elizabeth R. Gebert appeared for the State of Wisconsin.   Called at 4:00 pm  Cases called 15CF116, 15CF131, 15CF184, 15CF2017, 15CF212 & 15CM147.  15CF116 Plea to Ct 1,4,6,8, 10,11,15,16 20,24 & 30, remaining cts DRI  15CF131 Plea.  15CF184 Plea to ct 1, Ct 2DRI   15CF207 DRI all ct.  15CF212 DRI all ct. 15CM147 DRI   Plea agreement.  All felony 4 yrs prison.  1 yr IC & 3 yrs ES.  Misdemeanor counts 9 mo jail. Cost & DNA.  Restitution requested.  Letter of restitution filed with the court.  Stipulate to no credit.  Def agrees with plea agreement.  Atty Schuster waives right to preliminary hearing.  Victim rights have been complied with.  Waiver of right to preliminary form completed and reviewed.  Def waives rights to preliminary.  Court will accept waiver.  Plea questionnaire form completed and reviewed.  15CF131 Ct 1 - no contest  15CF184 Ct 1 - No contest   Statement by Atty Schuster.   Court finds probable cause, bound over.  Information filed.  Information received and waive reading.  15CF116 - Ct 1 No contest, Ct 4 - No contest  Ct 6 No contest   Ct 8 No contest.  Ct 10 No contest  Ct 11 No contest   Ct 15 No contest   Ct 16 No contest  Ct 20 No contest Ct 24 no contest  Ct 30 No contest  Based upon pleas entered, court will  DRI 15CM147   15CF207   15CF184 Ct 2,  15 CF212  15CF116 Ct 2,3,5,7,9,12,13,14,17,18,19,21,22, 23,25,26, 27, 28 & 29.   Constitutional rights, right to jury and elements reviewed.  Court finds finds def understands charges, penalties and rights.  Court reviews complaint in Chippewa Co. case.  All complaints have been reviewed by court.  Factual basis.   Court will accept pleas, found guilty.  15CF131 Ct 1, 15CF184 Ct 1, 16CF116 ct 1,4,6, 8,10. 11, 15, 16,20, 24, 30.  State gives sentencing recommendations.  Sentencing arguments presented by Atty Schuster.  Statement by def.  Sentencing remarks by Court.  Court vacate warrants issued in Langlade Co.  Court will follow plea agreement.  15CF131 Ct 1 4 yrs prison 1 yr IC 3 yrs ES  cost and DNA surcharge & sample.   15CF184 same sent.  4 yr. 1 yr IC & 3 yrs ES cost. & DNA surc.  15CF116 Ct 1, 6,8, 11,16,24 & 30  4 yrs prison,  1 yr Ic & 3 yrs ES   cost and only 1 DNA sur.  Ct 4 ,10, 15 & 20  9 months jail, huber concurrent with all sentences ordered today and any other sentences currently serving.   Cost only  No DNA surcharge $16,875.  Restitution  No credit   Eligible for substance abuse & challenge.   Felony conviction rights reviewed.  Cost on misdemeanor to be collected as condition of extended supervision.  Court will order that restitution will be paid first before any cost.   Post conviction rights.  (Warrants canceled with D.B)

Defendant Andrew David Schroeder in court via video, in custody.  Elizabeth R. Constable appeared for the State of Wisconsin.   Cases called 15CF116, 15CF131, 15CF184,15CF207, 15CF 212 and 15CM147.  Def request an atty. Court vacates warrants.  State give recommendations for bond, request conditions.   Question the no contact with S.I.   Bond set by Court  Adjourned initial appearance scheduled for January 30, 2017 at 01:30 pm.

Defendant Andrew David Schroeder not in court.  Ralph Malcom Uttke appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Cases called 15CM147, 15CF131, 15CF184, 15CF212, 15CF207, 15CF116.  State request warrant, body only, adjacent states.  Court so orders

Defendant Andrew David Schroeder in court.  Ralph Malcom Uttke appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Cases called 15CF184,15CF131,15CF116 and 15CM147.  Court reviews the files.  Def is not eligible for public defender.  Court has denied petition for court appointed atty.  Def is out on a signature bond for all cases.  Statement by def in regards to counsel.  Response by State.  Court reviews petition again, reasons given why denied.  State recommends additional condition of bond.  Court will adjourn however will note that this is the last adjournment.  Court will proceed with adjourned appearance on that date. Court will modify bond to include, no advance payments for any conrtact products or services.  Adjourned initial appearance scheduled for January 4, 2016 at 01:30 pm.

Defendant Andrew David Schroeder in court.  Jill Louise Laufenberg appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Court calls 15CF184, 15CM147, 15CF131, 15CF116 @ 2:05  pm.  Def. has copy of all 4 complaints, advised of charges and penalties.  Def. given atty rights. Def. makes statement on atty rights. Def. has filed with court Petition for Court appointed atty. Court reviews petition & federal guidelines. Def. explains why not working. Court will not appoint an attorney, denies request. Def. replys. Court will adjourn, would like def. to find work. Def. makes statement. AIA on all 4 files.  State gives bond recommendation. Court orders $3,000.00 Signature bond to cover all 4 files.  Adjourned initial appearance scheduled for November 2, 2015 at 01:30 pm.

Defendant Andrew David Schroeder in court.  Ralph Malcom Uttke appeared for the State of Wisconsin.   Cases called 15CF313, 15CM147 and 15CF116.   Def has contacted an atty.  Def request 3 weeks.  Bond  will continue for all cases  Adjourned initial appearance scheduled for October 5, 2015 at 01:30 pm.

Defendant Andrew David Schroeder in court.  Ralph Malcom Uttke appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Court calls 15CF116, 15CM147 & 15CF131  @ 3:19 pm.   Def. has copy of 3 complaints, advised of charges and penalties.  Def. given atty rights. Def. to complete atty form. State gives bond recommendation.  Court orders $2500.00 Signature bond to cover all 3 files.  Adjourned initial appearance scheduled for September 14, 2015 at 01:30 pm.
